Summary: Looked to be as if it should be there. Colorwise anyway
divs: Sighting DetailsDriving home, I spotted what looked to be the Cross that sits on the hill up in Morrison off of highway 285, but I was no where close to there. At first I dismissed it as the refraction off my windshield, but then as I turned, it remained in my vision. Once I arrived at my house, I realized I was the only one home, but I still went to pursue it. But as I got to the end of my driveway, a fox ran across the lawn directly across the street, startling me quite badly, but I went to go on, and then another fox ran directly behind me across the drive way, and I wussed out, and called it quits. Close to 7 years in this house, and I have yet to be scared, save this night. Anyone else see anything? It could not have been hard to miss.
